parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the DSG transmission can cause the vehicle to hesitate, jerk, or lunge forward, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates or jerks when shifting gears
and may experience a sudden loss of power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch can cause the vehicle to hesitate or jerk when shifting gears, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
and the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission mount can cause the transmission to shift violently, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: the vehicle jerks or lurches forward
and the transmission makes a loud noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The headlight issues can cause reduced road visibility, increasing the risk of accidents, especially at night.
symptoms: Low beam headlights do not project properly
headlights turn on automatically without tail lights.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical system failures can cause a range of issues, including reduced visibility, loss of speed control, and airbag malfunctions, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: faulty mass air intake flow sensor

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The difficulty in replacing the third brake light can lead to reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Unable to replace the third brake light without dealership assistance
no way to service the light without damaging the spoiler.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: EA888 Engine Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the timing chain and chain tensioner can cause engine failure, leading to a loss of power, stalling, and potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: engine warning lights on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Excessive Oil Consumption in 2.0L Turbo Engine
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive oil consumption can lead to premature engine wear, increased emissions, and potentially cause engine failure, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Increased oil consumption between oil changes
oil warning lights on the dashboard

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Cam Follower Failure in 2.0L Turbo Engine
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Cam follower failure can cause premature wear on the intake camshaft, leading to high-pressure fuel pump failure, engine failure, and potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
